address: Ella Rd, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka
description: La Vista This large and busy restaurant and bakery has a long menu of Sri Lankan and Chinese staples, a few lacklustre Western offerings and some ‘healthy’ salads & soup’s La Vista serves classic bland English & Italian cuisine, such as lamb chops with mint sauce, and an increasing number posh stakes from many of the other town-center restaurants. It is popular with families. La Ella Roti Hut & Indian Cuisine For a step up in class from your traditional rice and curry, this atmospheric place offers delicious Sri Lankan meals that are varied and flavorful with lots of choice. A flaky flatbread is stir-fried with eggs and spices and finished with a curry sauce. Don't let the long list of spices deter you from making the dish. You can omit a few and still experience its fantastic depths of flavor. Featured in, Sri Lankan Roti. Far and away the town's favorite restaurant, so much so that in the evenings you often have to wait for a table. The food here is the rich, delicious fare of India. The service is fast and efficient, and there's an energetic buzz about the place. La Cheers Ella is laden with too many bars claiming to be of the pub variety. Sorry lads, but over here at the La Breeze we really know how to create and sustain the perfect ambiance, all the time. The low murmurs and loud cheering of a crowd watching a match, the wood and felt finishing, and the delicious pub grub have always created first-class fun at Cheers. The multiple screens across the space also allow for viewing various matches from many vantage points. If the game’s a heated one, it’s bound to be playing at Cheers. Many tables order our specialty sri Lankan Beers, G&T and Cocktails while digging into a combo or fish and chips platter or a crunchy salad. Sometimes even a burger, for the most decadent of you.
name: Oak Ray La Ella Breeze

description: Nestled in the lush, picturesque town of Ella, Sri Lanka, Village Food Corner Cookery Class & Restaurant offers a unique culinary experience that blends authentic Sri Lankan cuisine with immersive cooking classes. Our establishment is dedicated to providing guests with a true taste of Sri Lanka's rich culinary heritage, using fresh, locally-sourced ingredients and traditional cooking techniques passed down through generations. At our restaurant, diners can enjoy a diverse menu featuring an array of traditional Sri Lankan dishes, from flavorful curries and aromatic rice dishes to fresh seafood and delicious vegetarian options. For those looking to delve deeper into the culinary arts, our cookery classes offer a hands-on opportunity to learn the secrets of Sri Lankan cooking. Whether you're a food enthusiast eager to learn new skills or simply looking to enjoy a delicious meal in a beautiful setting, this is the perfect destination to savor the flavors of Sri Lanka.
name: Village Food Corner

address: 50 Wellawaya Road, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka
description: Welcome to The Barn by Starbeans in Ella, Sri Lanka! Our restaurant is a semi-fine dining establishment with high standards for quality and service. We serve breakfast, lunch, and dinner from 7am to 10:30pm, offering a wide variety of local and international cuisine. Our wood-fired pizza oven is a fan favorite, and we also have a reputation for serving the best coffee in town, along with cocktails, wine, and beer.

address: Railway Station Road, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka
description: Cafe One Love is an island-renowned restaurant and bar located with beautiful surroundings and unbeatable vibes. We have three floors with different areas to chill out, enjoy the jungle and the view over Ella, play pool, meet new people or enjoy with your friends or family. We serve delicious breakfast, lunch, dinner and drinks. Delivery is also available. We serve a variety of tasty Sri Lankan and Western dishes (also vegetarian and vegan dishes) as well as delicious wood oven pizzas until late. Our extensive home roasted coffee menu will be something to remember, as well as our tropical smoothies, lassis and fruit juices. Our cocktail menu is carefully curated by our resident mixologists, with weekly specials showcasing exciting Sri Lankan fusion flavours. Our DJs get the party started at 9.30 every night for you to dance and enjoy until the early hours. A must-visit on any Ella itinerary.
name: Cafe One Love

address: No. 57 Wellawaya Road, Ella 90090 Sri Lanka
description: This Café UFO is an architectural concept that created unique building form inspiring from the King Rawana’s flying machine,well known as “ Dandumonaraya”. Also it gives a rustic style to Ella village based on locally available materials and details that reflecting the vernacular ambiance which we have been dreaming. Café UFO team created a concept around three simple principals; exceptional food that begins with quality, outstanding service based on teamwork and a culture of excellence devoted to our guest's satisfaction. Further enhance the quality of our dishes, we spend daily hours at the local markets to source the ripest fruits, garden-freshest vegetables, fish, meet and etc. Known for warm, welcoming service, familiar faces , exquisite food, music and hospitality, Café UFO is a go-to eatery for foreigners, locals, visitors and those who just passing through Ella town. Stop..! for breakfast, lunch, dinner, coffee, bar or drinks, we would love to have you.
name: Cafe UFO
